title: ‘Roglič and Who?’ – Giro d’Italia Reckons with Likely Absence of Biggest Names
content:
No Pogačar, no problem? Roglič expected to be the only one of the 'Big 4' to race this year's Giro, but that could be a good thing.

Read the full article at ‘Roglič and Who?’ – Giro d’Italia Reckons with Likely Absence of Biggest Names on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
